attributes.additional_details: It’s what the British people deserve, over a year has passed since the current government was elected, the country has gone backwards and without decisive action it will spiral out of control.
attributes.background: Immediate action needs to be addressed with the current political and economical issues within the UK. This now can only be resolved with a change of government.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
